section.name: Setup
section.p: This section describes how to install Qwt on your machine.

subsection.name: Prerequisites
subsection.p: A Unix machine: Linux or Mac OS should do, Windows doesn't work.
Python 2.3 or higher (because Qooxdoo needs it). Use python -V to verify.
Maven 2.0.7 or later. Use mvn -version to verify.
Subversion 1.3 or higher. Use svn --version to verify.

subsection.name: Setup
subsection.p:
First, make sure that Maven's heap size is at least 128 MB: place something like export MAVEN_OPTS=-Xmx128m
in your environment initialization (e.g. your .bash_profile).
